app.title: Supplementary Materials
app.p: Figure S1: 3D spatial density function (SDF) plot of the [P 44414]Cl + CH 3COOH +H 2O system for two different water content; Figure S2: Domain analysis of the CH 3COOH+Cl − subset based on the Voronoi tessellation method; Figure S3: Standardised coordination numbers (CNs) between [P 44414] + and CH 3COOH or Cl − as a function of the water content; Figure S4: Average diameter of [P 44414] + aggregates (20.0 wt.% IL) in the presence of acetic acid as estimated by dynamic light scattering; Table S1: Distribution coefficients in the biphasic [P 44414]Cl + CH 3COOH + H 2O of the principal metals in the NiMH leachate.
